ResetCache - class ResetCache.

ResetNodeDependencies() - Static method in class Node
OBSOLETE Rebuild the node --> table dependencies and store them into the LAZY_NODE_TABLE_DEP table There is a dependency N --> T iff table T appears in the "from" clause of node N (which is stored in the COLLECTION attribute of table NODES) Limitation: does not take into account view definitions
